Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_ABILITY_CHAINSHOT_MOVE_LOCKED_DESCRIPTION]Unable to move due to Chain Shot.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_ABILITY_DREAD_PIRATE_UNIT_ACTIVE_DESCRIPTION]Crew is inspired by seeing foes Walk the Plank.[NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Movement] Movement. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BLACKBEARD_FUSE_DESCRIPTION]Attacks deal -2 [ICON_Movement] Movement to the target unit on the next turn.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BONNY_PISTOLS_NUM_ATTACKS_DESCRIPTION]+1 additional attack per turn if [ICON_Movement] Movement allows. Can move after attacking.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BURY_TREASURE_TOOLTIP]Bury Treasure[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Bury 600 Gold to gain 30 [ICON_TreasureScore] Treasure Points.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_BURY_TREASURE_TREASURE_IN_WAY_TOOLTIP][COLOR:Red]Can't bury treasure on top of another treasure chest.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CAPTURE_BOAT_TOOLTIP]Capture Boat[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Consume a Crew to capture a damaged enemy ship and add it to your fleet.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CAREENING_ENEMY_TERRITORY_TOOLTIP][COLOR:Red]Unable to Careen while in enemy territory.[ENDCOLOR]

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CAREENING_TOOLTIP]Careening[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Deploy emergency repairs in shallow water. Exhaust [ICON_Movement] Movement in exchange for a rapid heal. The heal amount is based on amount of [ICON_Movement] Movement consumed.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CAREENING_WORLDTEXT]Put ye back into it! We can save her!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CITY_SACKED_WORLDTEXT]The walls crumble! The gold is ours!

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_BLACK_SPOT_DESCRIPTION]With this iron, you can mark your enemies with a curse that will follow them across the seas. It can never be washed off, so long as the curse lasts.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_BLACKBEARD_FUSE_DESCRIPTION]The dread pirate would put these in his beard and light them on fire to frighten his enemies. They were perhaps not necessary.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_BONNY_PISTOLS_DESCRIPTION]Anne Bonny, born Anne Fulford, was the paramour of the pirate Calico Jack, but when she teamed up with Mary Read, they ditched Jack and set sail together. Here are her pistols.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_CAPTAIN_KIDD_JOURNAL_DESCRIPTION]The legendary captain's journal! And, perhaps, locations to his buried caches.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_CRATES_OF_RUM_DESCRIPTION]A hogshead of Nelson's folly! We can sell this for plenty o' pennies at the ports we visit.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_CURSED_PIECES_OF_EIGHT_DESCRIPTION]They say one Captain Cleveland took these from a Spanish galleon's hold, but lost them in a duel. The victor was rich for a time, but was poisoned by a spurned lover, who ran a tavern in Tortuga until she got the pox, and so on. These gold pieces have been lucky, and unlucky, and now they are yours.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_DOWSING_ROD_DESCRIPTION]A farmer's dowsing rod, used by superstitious men to find water. With a twist here and there, maybe it will point to gold.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_ENGLISH_POINTER_DESCRIPTION]The dog is pointing and holding a lantern hanging down from its mouth. The lantern mysteriously glows brighter the more that figurehead points in the direction of the nearest ship.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_FISHING_FLOATS_DESCRIPTION]A string of colorful glass fishing floats strung together with netting, these "witch balls" have been used in the North Sea trade routes for so long that they contain and are enchanted by the winds of their namesake. When hung by a ship's yard arms they glow and will fill a ship's sails even on the calmest of days.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_JOLLY_ROGERS_DESCRIPTION]The black flag of terror itself. Most depicted a death's head, or a bleeding heart with a dart piercing it. The name may have come from the French "rouge", referring to a red flag, or from a sobriquet of the Devil.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_KRAKANNONS_DESCRIPTION]Twisting iron barrels and all the fury of the sea-beast! Cannons forged by Davey Jones himself!

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_LOLONNAIS_CUTLERY_DESCRIPTION]A fine dining set used by the dread pirate for his feasts. There is a rusty stain around the knife-handle that will not come out.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_SINGING_TOPMEN_DESCRIPTION]Topmen - men who work high above the decks in the rigging - are known for their songs, and you have hired some excellent singers. Sea chanties dispel the gloom of fogs, ease the anxiety of stormy seas, and make calm days pass more smoothly.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_CIVIC_RELIC_SKULL_FIRESHOT_DESCRIPTION]Not an actual skull, but rather a cleverly made iron cannonball. But when fearful superstitious seafaring enemies see these flying through the air toward them, trailing fire from eye sockets and mouth and emanating a screeching whistle... try to tell them different.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DEFEAT_COLONIAL_TEXT]Colonial powers should not be able to be defeated. How has the Admiral of the Black felled the giant?
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DEFEAT_PIRATE_TEXT]The sea comes to claim her own.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DREAD_PIRATE_ACTIVE_ACTIVATED_TT]Walk the Plank is active. Turns Remaining: {1_turnsRemaining}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DREAD_PIRATE_ACTIVE_ACTIVATED_WORLDTEXT]To the plank! And onwards to the abyss.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DREAD_PIRATE_ACTIVE_DEACTIVATED_WORLDTEXT]The crew is looking bored and shifty.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DREAD_PIRATE_ACTIVE_RECHARGING_TT][COLOR:Red]Walk the Plank is recharging. Turns Remaining: {1_turnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DREAD_PIRATE_PASSIVE_DESCRIPTION]+10 [ICON_Gold] Gold every time the unit engages in combat.

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_DREAD_PIRATE_UNIT_ACTIVE_TOOLTIP]Walk the Plank[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Inspire your crew by forcing a capturable ship's crew to walk the plank. Walk the Plank grants +3 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for 5 turns.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_FLAGSHIP_DESCRIPTION]This ship is the flagship of your fleet.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_GOVT_POPUP_PROMPT_POLICIES_CLOSE]Are you sure you want to close the menu?[NEWLINE]Relic changes have not been confirmed!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_HOARDER_ACTIVE_ACTIVATED_WORLDTEXT]Target their sails! Fire the chain shot!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_HOARDER_UNIT_ACTIVE_TOOLTIP]Chain Shot[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Lock an enemy naval unit into place for one turn.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NAVAL_FIELD_REPAIRS_DESCRIPTION]Field repairs constantly heal naval units at sea.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_GOODY_HUT_SUMMARY]We have received rumors that a new fleet of Buccaneers have moved into a nearby region.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_INFAMOUS_PIRATE_DEFEATED_SUMMARY]Word has spread that {1_InfamousPirateName} has been defeated.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_LETTER_OF_MARQUE_SUMMARY]Our Majesty has decided to grant us a letter of marque. We now pillage the seas in the name of {1_CivShortName}.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_NEW_BARBARIAN_CAMP_SUMMARY]We have received rumors that a new fleet of Buccaneers have moved into a nearby region.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_NEW_BURIED_TREASURE_SUMMARY]You have discovered a map to {1_playerName}'s treasure.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_NEW_INFAMOUS_PIRATE_SUMMARY]You have heard rumors of an infamous pirate sailing in this area.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_NEW_RELIC_SUMMARY]You have discovered a powerful relic during your travels.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_NEW_TREASURE_FLEET_SUMMARY]A new treasure fleet has set sail for Europe.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_TREASURY_BANKRUPT_SUMMARY]Your gold has run dry! Your fleet will soon mutiny!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_NOTIFICATION_YOUR_TREASURE_PILLAGED_SUMMARY]Another pirate has unearthed and spirited off your buried treasure!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PIRATES_CITY_NOT_SACKED]This city is ripe for the harvest.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PIRATES_CITY_SACKED]Smoke still rises from the city.[NEWLINE]It can be sacked again in {1_Turns: plural 1?{1_turns}turn; other?{1_Turns} turns;}.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PIRATES_PLOT_TOOLTIP_INFAMOUS_PIRATE][COLOR_RED]Thar's a buccaneer's wake on the foam. They're close![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PIRATES_PLOT_TOOLTIP_TREASURE_FLEET]We're layin right in the path of a Treasure Fleet!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PIRATES_PLOT_TOOLTIP_TREASURE_MAP]Ho ho me hearties! We smell gold on the wind, we do!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_BLACK_SPOT_DESCRIPTION]+10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting buccaneer or infamous pirates.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_BLACKBEARD_FUSE_DESCRIPTION]Naval unit attacks deal -2 [ICON_Movement] Movement to enemy ships for the next turn.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_BONNY_PISTOLS_DESCRIPTION]+1 additional attack for all units. All units can move after attacking.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_CAPTAIN_KIDD_JOURNAL_DESCRIPTION]50% chance of finding an additional treasure map when visiting a tavern.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_CURSED_PIECES_OF_EIGHT_DESCRIPTION]+3 gold per unit maintenance (higher chance of mutiny); 3% interest on gold reserves every turn.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_DOWSING_ROD_DESCRIPTION]Every ship can sense the closest treasure chest within 20 hexes.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_ENGLISH_POINTER_DESCRIPTION]Every ship will sense the closest unseen ship within 20 hexes.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_JOLLY_ROGERS_DESCRIPTION]Gain 50 additional gold when pillaging a trade ship. Makes the flags on the your ships look more tattered.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_KRAKANNONS_DESCRIPTION]+1 [ICON_range] Range for Sloops and Brigantines. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for naval units.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_LOLONNAIS_CUTLERY_DESCRIPTION]Gain [ICON_gold] Gold based on the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of defeated units.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_POLICY_RELIC_SINGING_TOPMEN_DESCRIPTION]Reduces unit maintenance cost by 3 per unit.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PRIVATEER_ACTIVE_ACTIVATED_TT]Bring Her Home is active. Turns Remaining: {1_turnsRemaining}
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PRIVATEER_ACTIVE_RECHARGING_TT][COLOR:Red]Bring Her Home is recharging. Turns Remaining: {1_turnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR]

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_PRIVATEER_UNIT_ACTIVE_TOOLTIP]Bring Her Home[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Capture an enemy vessel and turn it over to your patron for +5 [ICON_PirateScore] Infamous Pirate Points and +100 [ICON_Gold] Gold.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_RELIC_SCREEN_DRAG_RELIC_TEXT]Drag and Drop a Relic to Slot it Here
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_SHORE_PARTY_EMBARK_TOOLTIP]Embark[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Returns the Shore Party to the Crew on an adjacent naval ship.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_SHORE_PARTY_WORLDTEXT]Get in the boats, ye dirty bilge rats!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_SWASHBUCKLER_ACTIVE_ACTIVATED_WORLDTEXT]Comin' about, hard to lee! Brace yourselves!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_SWASHBUCKLER_ACTIVE_DEACTIVATED_WORLDTEXT]Aye, come about. Let's give her a rest for now.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_SWASHBUCKLER_ACTIVE_RECHARGING_TT][COLOR:Red]Tacking into the Wind is recharging. Turns Remaining: {1_turnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_SWASHBUCKLER_UNIT_ACTIVE_TOOLTIP]Tack into the Wind[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]2x [ICON_Movement] Movement for the current and next turn.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_TAVERN_COOLDOWN]The rum has run dry! [NEWLINE] Visit again in {1_Turns: plural 1?{1_turns}turn; other?{1_Turns} turns;}!
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_UNITOPERATION_BURY_TREASURE_ALREADY_IMPROVED_TT][COLOR:Red]Can only Bury Treasure on an empty plot.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_UNITOPERATION_BURY_TREASURE_OWNED_PLOT_TT][COLOR:Red]Can only Bury Treasure on an unowned plot.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_UNITOPERATION_CAPTURE_BOAT_FLAGSHIP_TT][COLOR:Red]Flagships and Infamous Pirates cannot be captured.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_UNITOPERATION_CAPTURE_BOAT_NO_DAMAGE_TT][COLOR:Red]Enemy ship needs to be more damaged![ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_UNITOPERATION_VISIT_TAVERN_RECHARGING_TT][COLOR:Red]Tavern still recoverying from last visit. Turns Remaining: {1_turnsRemaining}[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_VISIT_TAVERN_NOT_ADJACENT_TT][COLOR:Red]Not Adjacent to a Colonial City Center.[ENDCOLOR]

[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_VISIT_TAVERN_TOOLTIP]Visit Tavern[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Visit a tavern in the port to recruit crew and discover a new quest. Can only be used adjacent to a Colonial City Center
